column4: Running 11.04 on a Intel Duo @ 2.4 with 4 Gb of RAM, SSD and a GeForce 8400M GS and Gnome is not very responsive. Is this normal for the kind  of laptop spec?
Should be fast - you may need to make sure your video drivers are happy
System is upgraded and the NVIDIA current drivers are activated although "Additional drivers" util tells that are not currently in use. What can i do?
I use ATI not Nvidia so I'm not used to the drivers - but I suspect that is your problem
